content.text:
# 2017 Colonial Square Ladies Classic

Shannon Birchard
| Curling club = St. Vital CC, Winnipeg
| Skip = Shannon Birchard
| Third = Nicole Sigvaldason
| Second = Sheyna Andries
| Lead = Mariah Mondor
| Finalist =  Jennifer Jones
}}
The 2017 Colonial Square Ladies Classic was held from September 22 to 25 at the Nutana Curling Club in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, as part of the 2017â€“18 World Curling Tour. The event was in a Triple Knockout format.
